items.title: French ex-president Sarkozy begins jail sentence for campaign finance conspiracy
items.description: Nicolas Sarkozy, president from 2007-2012, has appealed against his jail term at La Sant√© prison.

items.title: Slovak PM Fico's attacker sentenced to 21 years in prison
items.description: Juraj Cintula - who fired five shots at close range at the prime minister - was found guilty of terrorism charges.

items.title: US chess grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky dies aged 29
items.description: The young prodigy's "unexpected passing" was announced by his family on Monday.

items.title: Belize agrees to host migrants seeking asylum in US
items.description: Belize's prime minister says the deal will mean that migrants can apply for asylum in the country.

items.title: Woman charged after 1.5m euros of gold stolen from Paris museum
items.description: Prosecutors say the woman was arrested in Barcelona with around a kilo of melted down gold.
